name: Flight Sim Part 1
description:
A simple flight simulator in Unity3D. Gamepad required.

Blog post: https://vazgriz.com/346/flight-simulator-in-unity3d-part-1/

git: https://github.com/vazgriz/FlightSim (at tag part-1)

Controls:

Left Stick - Roll/Pitch

Right Stick - Camera

Triggers - Yaw

Right Bumper - Throttle Up

Left Bumper - Throttle Down (Hold for Airbrake)

D-Pad Down - Toggle flaps and landing gear

H - Close help dialog

Tips:

- Speed is in knots

- Takeoff speed is ~130 knots

- Using airbrake with landing gear down will activate wheel brake

- Refresh the page to reset the game
